$drivers.desc: These mobile appraisers are currently in your area!
$drivers.distance: This appraiser is approximately {distance} away from you.
$drivers.name: Mobile Appraiser ({name})
$drivers.not-found: Unfortunately, we couldn't find any appraisers near you. Please choose another location or try again later.
$drivers.title: Mobile Appraisers Near You

$schedule.desc: Please select one of the nearest Cubee vehicles below to schedule your appointment with our Cubee staff at your location.
$schedule.title: Schedule Your Appointment with a Cubee Staff Member

$stations.desc: Please select one of the locations below to schedule your appointment at a Cubee container.
$stations.name: Appraiser Center {name}
$stations.title: Appointment Scheduling

$vehicle-condition.desc: Please select the current condition of your vehicle below.
$vehicle-condition.title: What is the condition of your vehicle? {'|'} Vehicle Condition

$vehicle-location.desc:driver: Please enter the address of your vehicle's current location so we can find the nearest mobile appraisers in your area.
$vehicle-location.desc:station: Please enter the address of your vehicle's current location so we can find the nearest facility in your area.
$vehicle-location.title: Where is your vehicle located?
$vehicle-location.error.not-supported: Geolocation is not supported by this browser.
$vehicle-location.error.permission-denied: Location permission denied. Please enable location access in your browser settings.
$vehicle-location.error.timeout: Location request timed out. Please try again or enter your location manually.
$vehicle-location.error.unavailable: Unable to determine your location. Please try again or enter your location manually.
